Core Features & Specifications

How to Use

  • Power on your Aura Cuff by pressing the side button.
  • Connect to the Aura App via Bluetooth for setup and customization.
  • Browse or create designs in the Studio, or select from the Gallery.
  • Sync your cuff with friends or set your daily look.
  • Charge easily with the magnetic pluck when needed.

Hardware

  • Flexible 360Â° high-resolution grayscale E-ink display.
  • Chassis made of aerospace-grade aluminum and hypoallergenic ceramic.
  • 7-day battery life (dynamic mode), 21+ days (static mode)
  • Seamless magnetic charging pluck.

Software

  • Studio: Design and upload custom patterns
  • Gallery: A marketplace for exclusive designs from artists and brands
  • Social sync: Match patterns with friends' cuffs in real-time
